author: Kolomiiets Dmytro Mikhailovich
description: Inspiration: “Usually, when people come into the bar, they will be asked, "What would you like to order?" And the usual answer is "Something tasty.” Bartenders of all countries have heard that phrase way too often, so I decided to unite all of us and save us from this situation.”
name: Something Tasty

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
